revised_title: Electron Microscopic Study of Changes in Sympathetic Nerves Constrictions
tldr: The study investigates the ultrastructural changes in unmyelinated axons of sympathetic nerves after constriction. It observes the accumulation of organelles, such as mitochondria and myelin figures, immediately distal to the constriction. The research also notes the absence of granular vesicles and a decrease in axonal endoplasmic reticulum, suggesting a differential movement of axoplasm and organelles in response to injury.
